name: Let Her Go, Player!
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS DISCUSSIONS/LOW-POLY DEPICTIONS OF VIOLENCE AND MURDER IN A DARKLY COMEDIC FASHION.

In the video game world of Notice "Me Guy-Kun," Blue Ribbon doesn't ask for much. She just wants to be violently murdered by the unfeeling Yandere-Chan in the least uncomfortable way possible. But when she finally takes some initiative and leads Yandere-Chan onto the locker instead of letting herself be killed in the pool, it sets off a series (digital) world shattering events that end in the titular character Guy-Kun getting his head blown off, and Blue Ribbon issuing a direct challenge to the player themself!  

What could have turned a passive, nameless NPC, into a shotgun wielding glitch on wheels out to challenge god itself! Uncover the mystery through exploration, code cracking, and some good old bucking the plot hook in this literally queer coded adventure out to prove that yanderes aren't born, their programmed!
